LibMTL.loss¶

class AbsLoss[source]¶

Bases: object

An abstract class for loss function.

property compute_loss(self, pred, gt)[source]¶

Calculate the loss.

Parameters

  • pred (torch.Tensor) – The prediction tensor.

  • gt (torch.Tensor) – The ground-truth tensor.

Returns

The loss.

Return type

torch.Tensor
